title: New Market Entry for a Real Estate Firm
body: Evaluating expansion opportunities by analyzing demographics, competitor presence, and commercial activity across secondary markets to prioritize regions with long-term investment potential and strategic alignment.

title: Growth Strategy for a B2B Service Provider
body: Developing a growth strategy by assessing the current client base, identifying underserved segments, and modeling potential revenue uplift from expanded offerings and new verticals.

title: Customer Sentiment Engine for the Hospitality Sector
body: Deploying an analytics tool that leverages NLP to extract sentiment from customer reviews and survey data, helping operators understand guest experience drivers and tailor offerings at scale.

title: Predictive Routing Tool for the Logistics Industry
body: Piloting a routing optimization solution that combines GPS data, delivery logs, and incident reports to reduce inefficiencies and predict accident risk based on historical patterns.
